rows.label: bf01080100_0010
rows.name: What, that's it?!

rows.label: bf01080100_0020
rows.name:
Is life, meh! This still more
than I give to non-friend!

rows.label: bf01080100_0030
rows.name:
If you bring military supplies,
then you get good price!

rows.label: bf01080100_0040
rows.name:
Ceasefire between Superbia and Invidia
not keep for too much longer, methinks.

rows.label: bf01080100_0050
rows.name: So weaponry is hot item!

rows.label: bf01080100_0060
rows.name:
Well? What friend think?
I make it worth your while!

rows.label: bf01080100_0070
rows.name:
I told you before,
I stay away from that sorta thing.

rows.label: bf01080100_0080
rows.name:
Oh, is shame! Rex good salvager, could
be good way to earn pretty penny!

rows.label: bf01080100_0090
rows.name: Waste of talent, if you ask me!

rows.label: bf01080100_0100
rows.name: Anyhoo! Where were we?

rows.label: bf01080100_0110
rows.name: I'll take your offer.

rows.label: bf01080100_0120
rows.name:
200 now, and you know
what to do with the rest.

rows.label: bf01080100_0130
rows.name: Okie-doodles!

rows.label: bf01080100_0140
rows.name:
Sending monies to Correl of
Iyasaki Village. Is right?

rows.label: bf01080100_0150
rows.name: Yeah.

rows.label: bf01080100_0160
rows.name:
Is beautiful thing! Sending money home
at such young age. I touched!

rows.label: bf01080100_0170
rows.name: Wish my own dum-dum littlepon did same!

rows.label: bf01080100_0180
rows.name: It's 'cos Gramps doesn't charge rent, hehe.

rows.label: bf01080100_0190
rows.name: All right, I'm countin' on ya!

rows.label: bf01080100_0200
rows.name: Roger! Pleasure doing business!
